alert.note: Alert for Marlboro (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 12 at 3:59PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Marlboro County through 430 PM EDT... At 359 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Bennettsville, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bennettsville, Mccoll, Clio, Dunbar, Blenheim, and Tatum. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
